title: Electrochemical urea production using carbon dioxide and nitrate: state of the art and perspectives
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00561A, Minireview
Mohsin Muhyuddin, Giovanni Zuccante, Piercarlo Mustarelli, Jonathan Filippi, Alessandro Lavacchi, Lior Elbaz, Yu-Han Chen, Plamen Atanassov, Carlo Santoro
The minireview highlights recent developments in designing electrocatalysts for the co-reduction of CO2 and nitrates into urea. It also discusses advanced detection methods for intermediates and final products, as well as future research prospects.
